description: This file defines a Flutter StatelessWidget called TvHomeScreen, which displays a grid of category cards for TV content browsing. It constructs a UI with a title and a grid of focusable category cards that navigate to listing screens upon selection.

classes.name: TvHomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a grid of focusable category cards for TV content browsing.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the TvHomeScreen, including a title and a grid of category cards.
